channel.title: GDB on VcVc Blog
channel.description: Recent content in GDB on VcVc Blog

item.title: GDB tutorial
item.description: Start gdb or gdb -q # exit ctrl + d or quit Use g++ -g main.cpp -o main gdb main -q or gdb -q file main Debug runing program ps ux | grep showpng gdb showpng 28334 -q CoreDump ** Check if off ** ulimit -c 0 # is off # tmp use ulimit -c unlimited ulimit -c unlimited # turn open permanent use vim /etc/security/limits.conf # add line * soft core unlimited # and echo "core.
